text.tspan: Use the "A" and "L" keys to respond to
For example, if you see the word "left", press the
"A" key as quick as possible (even when it
appears on the right side of the screen)
Did you notice that compatible stimuli were
much easier to respond to than incompatible
stimuli (e.g., the word "right" presented on the
Press space bar to exit program
Press the left key ("A") if you see the word "left"
Press the right key ("L") if you see the word "right"
